Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Add CouchDB index support to implicit private data collections
Issue.description: ERRO 4e9 Error processing index for chaincode marblesp : cannot create an index for an undefined collection= _implicit_org_Org1MSP {code} This story has two variants: # In the chaincode definition, define a CouchDB index for a specific named organization's implicit private data collection # In the chaincode definition, define a CouchDB index for all organization's implicit private data collections +Acceptance+ * Index created for named organization upon chaincode deployment. * Index created for each organization upon creation of their implicit private data collection state database (occurs upon first write to an org's collection). >
